New Records: The Cleveland Guardians achieved a three-game series sweep, including a win over the Chicago White Sox on September 11, 2024.
Key Match Events: Lane Thomas had 4 RBIs and the Cleveland Guardians' bullpen performed effectively to secure the victory.
Post-Match Reflections: Cleveland Guardians' manager Stephen Vogt expressed pride in the team's resilience during a challenging road trip.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Chicago White Sox suffered a franchise-record 15th consecutive home loss, while the Cleveland Guardians moved to a 4.5-game lead in the AL Central.
